name: Stellarace (Demo)
description:
Welcome to Stellarace, the ultimate space roller skating game where players can choose from four different avatars to race through the galaxy, competing against each other to be the fastest skater in the universe!

In Stellarace, you'll race through a variety of challenging space tracks filled with obstacles, jumps, and twists and turns. You'll need to be quick on your feet and have lightning-fast reflexes to dodge obstacles and make sharp turns, all while trying to outrun your opponents.

you'll need to go as fast as possible to outpace your opponents and win the race. To help you achieve this, the game features a boost system that allows you to speed up and gain an advantage over your opponents. However, use it wisely, as overuse of the boost can lead to your skater overheating and slowing down.

The game also features power-ups and bonuses that can give you a competitive edge. You can collect speed boosts and secure your place as the champion.

With its high-speed gameplay and challenging tracks, Stellarace is the perfect game for anyone who loves the thrill of racing and outpacing their enemies. So, put on your skates and get ready to race through the stars in Stellarace!
